author: Liuba Grechen Shirley
title: If America Doesn’t Invest in Childcare, Who Will Watch Our Kids When We Go Back to Work?
description: I am writing this article, nine months pregnant, as my 3-year-old is dancing around the room singing and my 5-year-old is trying to learn to read over Zoom. Parents across the country are attempting to work from home while homeschooling and caring for their c…
